# My Mystery Party (mymystery.party)

> My Mystery Party offers interactive murder mystery party kits, digital cold case files, and extensive party planning resources.

## Core Site Sections

- **Home**: https://mymystery.party/
- **Mystery Party Kits (Group Games)**: https://mymystery.party/kits
- **Cold Case Files (Solo/Small Group Puzzles)**: https://mymystery.party/cases
- **Invitation Creator**: https://mymystery.party/invitations
- **Party Planning Blog**: https://mymystery.party/blog

## Mystery Party Kits
Current available full party kits. Use these links for game details, hosting guides, and character assignments.

### Valentine's Mixer: Swipe for Murder
- **Kit URL**: https://mymystery.party/kits/valentines-mixer-swipe-for-murder
- **Play Portal**: https://mymystery.party/kits/valentines-mixer-swipe-for-murder/play
- **Cast List & Character Profiles**:
  - Rocco Steel: https://mymystery.party/kits/valentines-mixer-swipe-for-murder/play/characters/rocco-steel
  - Dr. Theo Cure: https://mymystery.party/kits/valentines-mixer-swipe-for-murder/play/characters/dr-theo-cure
  - Giovanni Moretti: https://mymystery.party/kits/valentines-mixer-swipe-for-murder/play/characters/giovanni-moretti
  - Jayden Hoops: https://mymystery.party/kits/valentines-mixer-swipe-for-murder/play/characters/jayden-hoops
  - Alfie Snips: https://mymystery.party/kits/valentines-mixer-swipe-for-murder/play/characters/alfie-snips
  - Rex Flex: https://mymystery.party/kits/valentines-mixer-swipe-for-murder/play/characters/rex-flex

  - Finley Fish: https://mymystery.party/kits/valentines-mixer-swipe-for-murder/play/characters/finley-fish
  - Chad Glute: https://mymystery.party/kits/valentines-mixer-swipe-for-murder/play/characters/chad-glute
  - Orla O'Hara: https://mymystery.party/kits/valentines-mixer-swipe-for-murder/play/characters/orla-ohara

  - Libbie Liberty: https://mymystery.party/kits/valentines-mixer-swipe-for-murder/play/characters/libbie-liberty

## Cold Case Files
Digital and printable cold case files where players solve a mystery using evidence documents.

- **Station Zero**: https://mymystery.party/cases/station-zero
- **The Final Rehearsal**: https://mymystery.party/cases/the-final-rehearsal
- **Sins of Saint Lazarus**: https://mymystery.party/cases/sins-of-saint-lazarus
- **Palazzo of Bones**: https://mymystery.party/cases/palazzo-of-bones
- **Zero Sum**: https://mymystery.party/cases/zero-sum
- **Her Shadow's Name**: https://mymystery.party/cases/her-shadows-name

## Party Hosting Resources (Blog)
Guides on how to host, what to wear, and how to select a game.

### Hosting & Mechanics
- How to Host an Epic Mystery Party: https://mymystery.party/blog/how-to-host-an-epic-mystery-party
- Natural Language Objectives Guide: https://mymystery.party/blog/natural-language-objectives-guide
- Understanding Evidence Types: https://mymystery.party/blog/unique-evidence-types
- How to Play Digital Cold Cases: https://mymystery.party/blog/how-to-play-digital-cold-case

### Themes & Costumes
- Top 10 Costumes (2026): https://mymystery.party/blog/top-10-mystery-party-costumes-2026
- Halloween Outfits: https://mymystery.party/blog/halloween-mystery-party-outfits
- 80s & Y2K Looks: https://mymystery.party/blog/80s-y2k-mystery-party-looks

## Tools
- **Invitation Dashboard**: https://mymystery.party/invitations/dashboard
- **Invitation Templates**:
  - Formal/Classic: https://mymystery.party/invitations/formal-elegance-classic
  - Halloween: https://mymystery.party/invitations/Halloween-party
  - Kraft/Handwritten: https://mymystery.party/invitations/handwritten-charm-kraft
